metadata.name: Don't forget to look up at the sky and smile.
metadata.description:
We could no longer walk outside with a smile on our faces.

We are living in a time when we cannot walk outside with a smile on our face because our smile is hidden by a mask.

But never forget to smile!

Because as long as we remember to smile, there will come a time when we will be able to walk around outside with a smile again.
